hero.headline: Reduce enterprise dependency without losing control
hero.subheadline: Replace the capabilities you need. Keep the systems you trust.

pillars: Cut run-rate cost by removing low-value complexity
Protect systems of record, audit trails, and reporting integrity
Sequence change in reversible, capability-based steps
whatYouGet: Dependency map showing what is truly mission-critical vs. merely entangled
Capability business case with finance-grade baselines and risk notes
Parallel-run plan that proves continuity before cutover
Control points for approvals, reconciliations, and exception handling
Capability cutover brief with rollback criteria and owner sign-off
